forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then mainly cloudy during the afternoon with thunderstorms likely. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain this evening with thunderstorms developing overnight. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain this evening with thunderstorms by morning. Low 41F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
